org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.kms.server

接口 KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.KeyACLs

  • 所有已知实现类:
    KMSACLs
    封闭类:
    KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider

    public static interface KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.KeyACLs
    Interface that needs to be implemented by a client of the KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean hasAccessToKey(String aclName, org.apache.hadoop.security.UserGroupInformation ugi, KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.KeyOpType opType)
      This is called by the KeyProvider to check if the given user is authorized to perform the specified operation on the given acl name.
      boolean isACLPresent(String aclName, KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.KeyOpType opType) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • hasAccessToKey

        boolean hasAccessToKey(String aclName,
                     org.apache.hadoop.security.UserGroupInformation ugi,
                     KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.KeyOpType opType)
        This is called by the KeyProvider to check if the given user is authorized to perform the specified operation on the given acl name.
        参数:
        aclName - name of the key ACL
        ugi - User's UserGroupInformation
        opType - Operation Type
        返回:
        true if user has access to the aclName and opType else false

      • isACLPresent

        boolean isACLPresent(String aclName,
                   KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.KeyOpType opType)
        参数:
        aclName - ACL name
        opType - Operation Type
        返回:
        true if AclName exists else false
